Widget.name: Drop-down Lists
Widget.Description: This widget allows you to add a drop-down list on a form.

Option.name: Destination page on click
Option.Description: Indicates the URL that should be accessed for a refinement option. If blank, you stay on the same page.

Option.name: Display empty facet
Option.Description: Displays empty facets, that is to say, facets that do not have any categories.

Option.name: Facet root list mode
Option.Description:
Specifies the facet list filtering mode.
For the 'Exclude' and 'Include' modes, the 'Facet list' field allows to specify the metas to include or exclude.
Leaving facet root list empty forces iteration over all the facets independent of what mode is chosen.

Option.name: Facets list
Option.Description: The specified facets, separated by commas, will be either the only ones displayed ('Include' mode) or the only ones hidden ('Exclude' mode). Leaving the facet list empty iterates over all facets.

Option.name: Max number of categories
Option.Description: Specifies the maximum number of categories to display. You must enter an integer.

Option.name: Sort facets by
Option.Description: Sorts the facets using the selected method. Selecting anything but 'default' impacts performance.

Option.name: Sort categories by
Option.Description:
Sorts the categories using the selected method. Selecting anything but 'default' impacts performance.
  • 'default' requires no processing.
  • 'shuffle', 'desc*', 'score*', 'count*' and 'range*' impact performance on the server side.

Option.name: Aggregation
Option.Description: Specifies the type of aggregation that will be displayed next to the facet name.

Option.name: Filter null aggregations
Option.Description: Display or not the categories if the given aggregation is null (except count). Can reduce performance in case of facet with lots of categories. Default false.

Option.name: Default aggregation value
Option.Description: If no filter null aggregations, specify default aggregation value

Option.name: Widget Title
Option.Description: Widget title. If blank, no name is displayed.

Option.name: JSP path to use if no results
Option.Description: If there are no results, the widget is either hidden using a trigger, or a message is displayed using the content of a JSP file.

Option.name: Force refinement for feeds
Option.Description: Forces refinements on the specified feeds.
